publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3911.1 Christine May: Women Still Under-Represented—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3911) in the name of Ms Sandra White, leave out from "condemns" to end and insert "notes that in the 2003 Scottish Parliament elections only one-third of SNP MSPs elected were women and believes that all political parties should take steps to match the record of the Labour Party in Scotland in the proportion of women elected as MSPs."

S2M-3911.1 Christine May: Women Still Under-Represented—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3911) in the name of Ms Sandra White, leave out from "condemns" to end and insert "notes that in the 2003 Scottish Parliament elections only one-third of SNP MSPs elected were women and believes that all political parties should take steps to match the record of the Labour Party in Scotland in the proportion of women elected as MSPs."
